name: Speech To Recycle
description:
Story

Your wife ordered you to throw away the trash! Before she gets angry, will you be able to throw away the trash to the right bin?

How to play

There are 4 types of trash:

  • combustible (food, paper)
  • incombustible (plastic, metal...)
  • glass
  • can

By using voice commands, you can put the trash to the target trash bin.

The voice commands are:

  • combustible / burnable
  • incombustible / non burnable
  • glass
  • can

In case you have trouble using the speech recognition, you can use the keyboard ("Q", "W", "E", "R" are combustible, incombustible, glass and can respectively). 

Others

Speech To Recycle is a one-man game made in 48 hours for "Bolt Jam 3".

External assets used are:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/hq-office-props-codiscit...

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/bottles-pack-3d-models-86109
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/food/fruits-pack-3d-models-91669
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/furniture/pack-gesta-furniture-1-...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/female-character-portraits-7...
